{"currentConversationId":"73244ec4-1025-4e67-acd5-37b5a04cb61d","conversations":{"a8850ead-576e-45dd-8858-7c8802352318":{"id":"a8850ead-576e-45dd-8858-7c8802352318","createdAtIso":"2025-06-09T06:49:33.038Z","lastInteractedAtIso":"2025-06-09T08:12:31.219Z","chatHistory":[{"request_id":"c74a66bf-fbf2-4811-9e7f-d13e8af7b668","uuid":"11e0f390-c0d1-4a64-93ab-648ac264433c","chatItemType":"agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","status":"success","fromTimestamp":0,"toTimestamp":1749451773038,"seen_state":"seen"},{"status":"success","request_id":"41d954bf-9929-4a1d-ae39-001ac81876dd","request_message":"根据我提供的md文档，生成功能：# Clean Architecture Helper

一个用于快速创建 Clean Architecture 目录结构的 VSCode 插件，支持 Flutter、React、Node.js 等项目。

## 功能特性

### ️ 创建基础结构
- 快速创建完整的 Clean Architecture 基础目录结构
- 包含 `core`、`features`、`shared` 等标准目录
- 支持多种项目类型（Flutter、React、Node.js 等）

### 创建 Feature 模块
- 为每个功能模块快速创建标准的三层架构目录
- 包含 `data`、`domain`、`presentation` 层
- 自动规范化 Feature 名称

### ⚙️ 可配置的目录结构
- 完全可自定义的目录结构配置
- 支持多层级嵌套目录
- 可以保存和重置配置

## 使用方法

### 1. 创建基础结构
- 在文件资源管理器中右键点击目录
- 选择 "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构"
- 或使用命令面板：`Clean Arch: 创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构`

### 2. 创建 Feature 模块
- 在文件资源管理器中右键点击目录（推荐在 `features` 目录中）
- 选择 "创建 Feature 模块"
- 输入 Feature 名称
- 或使用命令面板：`Clean Arch: 创建 Feature 模块`

### 3. 配置目录结构
- 使用设置面板：`Clean Arch: 配置目录结构`
- 选择要编辑的配置类型
- 支持查看、编辑、重置配置

## 默认目录结构

### 基础结构
```
lib/
├── core/
│ ├── constants/
│ ├── errors/
│ ├── network/
│ ├── usecases/
│ └── utils/
├── features/
└── shared/
 ├── data/
 │ ├── datasources/
 │ ├── models/
 │ └── repositories/
 ├── domain/
 │ ├── entities/
 │ ├── repositories/
 │ └── usecases/
 └── presentation/
 ├── bloc/
 ├── pages/
 └── widgets/
```

### Feature 结构
```
feature_name/
├── data/
│ ├── datasources/
│ ├── models/
│ └── repositories/
├── domain/
│ ├── entities/
│ ├── repositories/
│ └── usecases/
└── presentation/
 ├── bloc/
 ├── pages/
 └── widgets/
```

## 配置说明

插件支持通过 VSCode 设置进行配置：

### 基础结构配置
```json
{
 "cleanArch.baseStructure": {
 "lib": {
 "core": {
 "constants": {},
 "errors": {},
 "network": {},
 "usecases": {},
 "utils": {}
 },
 "features": {},
 "shared": {
 // ... 更多配置
 }
 }
 }
}
```

### Feature 结构配置
```json
{
 "cleanArch.featureStructure": {
 "data": {
 "datasources": {},
 "models": {},
 "repositories": {}
 },
 "domain": {
 "entities": {},
 "repositories": {},
 "usecases": {}
 },
 "presentation": {
	“bindings”:{},
 	"controller": {}, 
	"pages": {},
 	"widgets": {}
 }
 }
}
```

"},{"id":2,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":0,"type":0,"text_node":{"content":"# Clean Architecture Helper

一个用于快速创建 Clean Architecture 目录结构的 Jetbrains 插件，支持 Flutter、React、Node.js 等项目。

## 功能特性

### ️ 创建基础结构
- 快速创建完整的 Clean Architecture 基础目录结构
- 包含 `core`、`features`、`shared` 等标准目录
- 支持多种项目类型（Flutter、React、Node.js 等）

### 创建 Feature 模块
- 为每个功能模块快速创建标准的三层架构目录
- 包含 `data`、`domain`、`presentation` 层
- 自动规范化 Feature 名称

### ⚙️ 可配置的目录结构
- 完全可自定义的目录结构配置
- 支持多层级嵌套目录
- 可以保存和重置配置

## 使用方法

### 1. 创建基础结构
- 在文件资源管理器中右键点击目录
- 选择 "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构"
- 或使用命令面板：`Clean Arch: 创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构`

### 2. 创建 Feature 模块
- 在文件资源管理器中右键点击目录（推荐在 `features` 目录中）
- 选择 "创建 Feature 模块"
- 输入 Feature 名称
- 或使用命令面板：`Clean Arch: 创建 Feature 模块`

### 3. 配置目录结构
- 使用设置面板：`Clean Arch: 配置目录结构`
- 选择要编辑的配置类型
- 支持查看、编辑、重置配置

## 默认目录结构

### 基础结构
```
lib/
├── core/
│ ├── constants/
│ ├── errors/
│ ├── network/
│ ├── usecases/
│ └── utils/
├── features/
└── shared/
 ├── data/
 │ ├── datasources/
 │ ├── models/
 │ └── repositories/
 ├── domain/
 │ ├── entities/
 │ ├── repositories/
 │ └── usecases/
 └── presentation/
 ├── controllers/
 ├── pages/
 └── widgets/
```

### Feature 结构
```
feature_name/
├── data/
│ ├── datasources/
│ ├── models/
│ └── repositories/
├── domain/
│ ├── entities/
│ ├── repositories/
│ └── usecases/
└── presentation/
 ├── controllers/
 ├── pages/
 └── widgets/
```

## 配置说明

插件支持通过 VSCode 设置进行配置：

### 基础结构配置
```json
{
 "cleanArch.baseStructure": {
 "lib": {
 "core": {
 "constants": {},
 "errors": {},
 "network": {},
 "usecases": {},
 "utils": {}
 },
 "features": {},
 "shared": {
 // ... 更多配置
 }
 }
 }
}
```

### Feature 结构配置
```json
{
 "cleanArch.featureStructure": {
 "data": {
 "datasources": {},
 "models": {},
 "repositories": {}
 },
 "domain": {
 "entities": {},
 "repositories": {},
 "usecases": {}
 },
 "presentation": {
	“bindings”:{},
 	"controller": {}, 
	"pages": {},
 	"widgets": {}
 }
 }
}
```

## 开发计划

基于您提供的需求文档，我将创建以下文件和功能：

### 1. 核心配置和数据结构
- `DirectoryStructure.kt` - 目录结构数据类
- `CleanArchSettings.kt` - 插件设置管理
- `DefaultStructures.kt` - 默认的基础结构和 Feature 结构配置

### 2. 核心服务
- `DirectoryCreatorService.kt` - 目录创建服务
- `StructureConfigService.kt` - 结构配置管理服务

### 3. 用户界面
- `CreateBaseStructureAction.kt` - 创建基础结构的 Action
- `CreateFeatureAction.kt` - 创建 Feature 模块的 Action
- `ConfigureStructureAction.kt` - 配置目录结构的 Action
- `FeatureNameDialog.kt` - Feature 名称输入对话框
- `StructureConfigDialog.kt` - 结构配置对话框

### 4. 配置文件更新
- 更新 `plugin.xml` 添加 Actions 和扩展点
- 更新插件描述和信息

让我开始实现这些功能：

DirectoryStructure> = emptyMap()\n) {\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u4e3a\u53f6\u5b50\u8282\u70b9\uff08\u6ca1\u6709\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\uff09\n */\n fun isLeaf(): Boolean = mutableListOf<String>()\n \n for ((name, subStructure) in directories) {\n val currentPath = if (prefix.isEmpty()) name else \"$prefix/$name\"\n paths.add(currentPath)\n \n // \u9012\u5f52\u6dfb\u52a0\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\u8def\u5f84\n paths.addAll(subStructure.getAllPaths(currentPath))\n }\n \n return paths\n }\n \n /**\n * \u5c06\u7ed3\u6784\u8f6c\u6362\u4e3a JSON \u5b57\u7b26\u4e32\n */\n fun toJson(): String {\n return Gson().toJson(this)\n }\n \n companion object {\n /**\n * \u4ece JSON \u5b57\u7b26\u4e32\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n */\n fun fromJson(json: String): DirectoryStructure {\n return try {\n Gson().fromJson(json, DirectoryStructure::class.java)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n DirectoryStructure()\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u4ece Map \u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n */\n fun fromMap(map: Map<String, Any>): DirectoryStructure {\n val directories = mutableMapOf<String, DirectoryStructure>()\n \n for ((key, value) in map) {\n when (value) {\n is Map<*, *> -> {\n @Suppress(\"UNCHECKED_CAST\")\n directories[key] = fromMap(value as Map<String, Any>)\n }\n else -> {\n // \u5982\u679c\u503c\u4e0d\u662f Map\uff0c\u5219\u521b\u5efa\u4e00\u4e2a\u7a7a\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n directories[key] = DirectoryStructure()\n }\n }\n }\n \n return DirectoryStructure(directories)\n }\n \n /**\n * \u8f6c\u6362\u4e3a Map \u683c\u5f0f\n */\n fun toMap(structure: DirectoryStructure): Map<String, Any> {\n val result = mutableMapOf<String, Any>()\n \n for ((key, value) in structure.directories) {\n if (value.isLeaf()) {\n result[key] = emptyMap<String, Any>()\n } else {\n result[key] = toMap(value)\n }\n }\n \n return result\n }\n }\n}\n\n/**\n * \u9879\u76ee\u7c7b\u578b\u679a\u4e3e\n */\nenum com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.model.DirectoryStructure\nimport com.intellij.openapi.application.ApplicationManager\nimport com.intellij.openapi.project.Project\nimport com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile\nimport com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VfsUtil\nimport com.intellij.openapi.command.WriteCommandAction\nimport java.io.IOException\n\n/**\n * \u76ee\u5f55\u521b\u5efa\u670d\u52a1\n * \u8d1f\u8d23\u6839\u636e\u914d\u7f6e\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n */\nclass DirectoryCreatorService {\n \n /**\n * \u5728\u6307\u5b9a\u76ee\u5f55\u4e0b\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n */\n fun createDirectoryStructure(\n project: Project,\n baseDirectory: VirtualFile,\n structure: DirectoryStructure,\n onProgress: ((String) -> Unit)? = null,\n onComplete: ((Boolean, String?) -> Unit)? = null\n ) {\n ApplicationManager.getApplication().invokeLater {\n WriteCommandAction.runWriteCommandAction(project) {\n try {\n createDirectoriesRecursively(baseDirectory, structure, onProgress)\n onComplete?.invoke(true, null)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n onComplete?.invoke(false, e.message)\n }\n }\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u9012\u5f52\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55\n */\n private fun createDirectoriesRecursively(\n parentDir: VirtualFile,\n structure: DirectoryStructure,\n onProgress: ((String) -> Unit)? = null\n ) {\n for ((dirName, subStructure) in structure.directories) {\n onProgress?.invoke(\"\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55: ${parentDir.path}/$dirName\")\n \n val newDir = try {\n parentDir.findChild(dirName) ?: parentDir.createChildDirectory(this, dirName)\n } catch (e: IOException) {\n throw IOException(\"\u65e0\u6cd5\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55: ${parentDir.path}/$dirName - ${e.message}\")\n }\n \n // \u9012\u5f52\u521b\u5efa\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\n if (!subStructure.isLeaf()) {\n createDirectoriesRecursively(newDir, subStructure, onProgress)\n }\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\n */\n fun createFeatureModule(\n project: Project,\n baseDirectory: VirtualFile,\n featureName: String,\n structure: DirectoryStructure,\n onProgress: ((String) -> Unit)? = null,\n onComplete: ((Boolean, String?) -> Unit)? = null\n ) {\n ApplicationManager.getApplication().invokeLater {\n WriteCommandAction.runWriteCommandAction(project) {\n try {\n // \u89c4\u8303\u5316 Feature \u540d\u79f0\n val normalizedName = normalizeFeatureName(featureName)\n onProgress?.invoke(\"\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757: $normalizedName\")\n \n // \u521b\u5efa Feature \u6839\u76ee\u5f55\n val featureDir = baseDirectory.findChild(normalizedName) \n ?: baseDirectory.createChildDirectory(this, normalizedName)\n \n // \u521b\u5efa Feature \u5185\u90e8\u7ed3\u6784\n createDirectoriesRecursively(featureDir, structure, onProgress)\n \n onComplete?.invoke(true, null)\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n onComplete?.invoke(false, e.message)\n }\n }\n }\n }\n \n /**\n * \u89c4\u8303\u5316 Feature \u540d\u79f0\n * \u8f6c\u6362\u4e3a\u5c0f\u5199\uff0c\u7528\u4e0b\u5212\u7ebf\u5206\u9694\n */\n private fun normalizeFeatureName(name: String): String {\n return name.trim()\n .replace(Regex(\"[\\\\s-]+\"), \"_\") // \u7a7a\u683c\u548c\u8fde\u5b57\u7b26\u8f6c\u4e3a\u4e0b\u5212\u7ebf\n .replace(Regex(\"[^a-zA-Z0-9_]\"), \"\") // \u79fb\u9664\u7279\u6b8a\u5b57\u7b26\n .lowercase()\n }\n \n /**\n * \u68c0\u67e5\u76ee\u5f55\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\n */\n fun checkDirectoryExists(baseDirectory: VirtualFile, dirName: String): Boolean {\n return baseDirectory.findChild(dirName) != null\n }\n \n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\u9884\u89c8\n */\n fun getStructurePreview(structure: DirectoryStructure, prefix: String = \"\"): List<String> {\n return structure.getAllPaths(prefix)\n }\n \n /**\n * \u9a8c\u8bc1\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\u79f0\n */\n fun validateDirectoryName(name: String): Pair<Boolean, String?> {\n if (name.isBlank()) {\n return false to \"\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\u79f0\u4e0d\u80fd\u4e3a\u7a7a\"\n }\n \n if (name.contains(Regex(\"[<>:\\\"/\\\\\\\\|?*]\"))) {\n return false to \"\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\u79f0\u5305\u542b\u975e\u6cd5\u5b57\u7b26\"\n }\n \n if (name.length > 255) {\n return false to \"\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\u79f0\u8fc7\u957f\"\n }\n \n return true to null\n }\n \n companion object {\n /**\n * \u83b7\u53d6\u670d\u52a1\u5b9e\u4f8b\n */\n fun getInstance(): DirectoryCreatorService {\n return DirectoryCreatorService()\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":2,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File Messages.getQuestionIcon()\n )\n \n if (result != Messages.YES) {\n return\n }\n \n // \u5728\u540e\u53f0\u4efb\u52a1\u4e2d\u521b\u5efa\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n ProgressManager.getInstance().run(object : Task.Backgroundable(project, \"\u521b\u5efa Clean Architecture \u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\", true) {\n override fun run(indicator: ProgressIndicator) {\n indicator.isIndeterminate = false\n indicator.fraction = 0.0\n \n val totalSteps = structurePreview.size\n var currentStep = 0\n \n creatorService.createDirectoryStructure(\n project = project,\n onComplete = { success, errorMessage ->\n if (success) {\n Messages.showInfoMessage(\n project,\n \"Clean Architecture \u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u521b\u5efa\u6210\u529f\uff01\\n\\n\" +\n \"\u4f4d\u7f6e: ${targetDirectory.path}\\n\" +\n \"\u5171\u521b\u5efa\u4e86 ${structurePreview.size} \u4e2a\u76ee\u5f55\u3002\",\n \"\u521b\u5efa\u6210\u529f\"\n )\n } else {\n )\n }\n })\n }\n \n override fun update(e: AnActionEvent) {\n val project = e.project\n val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE)\n \n // com.intellij.openapi.progress.ProgressManager\nimport com.intellij.openapi.progress.Task\nimport com.intellij.openapi.ui.Messages\nimport com.intellij.openapi.vfs.VirtualFile\n\n/**\n * \u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\u7684 Action\n */\nclass CreateFeatureAction : AnAction() {\n \n override fun actionPerformed(e: AnActionEvent) {\n val project = e.project ?: return\n val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE) ?: return\n \n // \u786e\u4fdd\u9009\u62e9\u7684\u662f\u76ee\u5f55\n val targetDirectory = if (selectedFile.isDirectory) {\n selectedFile\n } else {\n selectedFile.parent ?: return\n }\n \n // \u663e\u793a Feature \u540d\u79f0\u8f93\u5165\u5bf9\u8bdd\u6846\n val dialog = FeatureNameDialog(project)\n if (!dialog.showAndGet()) {\n return\n }\n \n val featureName = dialog.getFeatureName()\n if (featureName.isBlank()) {\n Messages.showWarningDialog(project, \"Feature \u540d\u79f0\u4e0d\u80fd\u4e3a\u7a7a\", \"\u8f93\u5165\u9519\u8bef\")\n return\n }\n \n // \u9a8c\u8bc1\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\u79f0\n val creatorService = DirectoryCreatorService.getInstance()\n val (isValid, errorMessage) = creatorService.validateDirectoryName(featureName)\n if (!isValid) {\n Messages.showWarningDialog(project, errorMessage ?: \"\u65e0\u6548\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\u79f0\", \"\u8f93\u5165\u9519\u8bef\")\n return\n }\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\u540c\u540d\u76ee\u5f55\n if (creatorService.checkDirectoryExists(targetDirectory, featureName)) {\n val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(\n project,\n \"\u76ee\u5f55 '$featureName' \u5df2\u5b58\u5728\uff0c\u662f\u5426\u7ee7\u7eed\uff1f\\n\\n\u8fd9\u53ef\u80fd\u4f1a\u5728\u73b0\u6709\u76ee\u5f55\u4e2d\u521b\u5efa\u65b0\u7684\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\u3002\",\n \"\u76ee\u5f55\u5df2\u5b58\u5728\",\n Messages.getWarningIcon()\n )\n if (result != Messages.YES) {\n return\n }\n }\n \n // \u83b7\u53d6\u914d\u7f6e\u670d\u52a1\n val configService = StructureConfigService.getInstance()\n val featureStructure = configService.getFeatureStructure()\n \n // \u663e\u793a\u786e\u8ba4\u5bf9\u8bdd\u6846\n val structurePreview = creatorService.getStructurePreview(featureStructure, featureName)\n val previewText = structurePreview.take(10).joinToString(\"\\n\") + \n if (structurePreview.size > 10) \"\\n... \u8fd8\u6709 ${structurePreview.size - 10} \u4e2a\u76ee\u5f55\" else \"\"\n \n val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(\n project,\n \"\u5c06\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\uff1a$featureName\\n\\n\" +\n \"\u76ee\u6807\u76ee\u5f55: ${targetDirectory.path}\\n\\n\" +\n \"\u5c06\u521b\u5efa\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\uff1a\\n$previewText\\n\\n\" +\n \"\u662f\u5426\u7ee7\u7eed\uff1f\",\n \"\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\",\n Messages.getQuestionIcon()\n )\n \n if (result != Messages.YES) {\n return\n }\n \n // \u5728\u540e\u53f0\u4efb\u52a1\u4e2d\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\n ProgressManager.getInstance().run(object : Task.Backgroundable(project, \"\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757: $featureName\", true) {\n override fun run(indicator: ProgressIndicator) {\n indicator.isIndeterminate = false\n indicator.fraction = 0.0\n \n val totalSteps = structurePreview.size\n var currentStep = 0\n \n creatorService.createFeatureModule(\n project = project,\n baseDirectory = targetDirectory,\n featureName = featureName,\n structure = featureStructure,\n onProgress = { message ->\n currentStep++\n indicator.fraction = currentStep.toDouble() / totalSteps\n indicator.text = message\n },\n onComplete = { success, errorMessage ->\n if (success) {\n Messages.showInfoMessage(\n project,\n \"Feature \u6a21\u5757 '$featureName' \u521b\u5efa\u6210\u529f\uff01\\n\\n\" +\n \"\u4f4d\u7f6e: ${targetDirectory.path}/$featureName\\n\" +\n \"\u5171\u521b\u5efa\u4e86 ${structurePreview.size} \u4e2a\u76ee\u5f55\u3002\",\n \"\u521b\u5efa\u5931\u8d25\"\n )\n }\n }\n )\n }\n })\n }\n \n override fun update(e: AnActionEvent) {\n val project = e.project\n val selectedFile = e.getData(CommonDataKeys.VIRTUAL_FILE)\n \n // {\n val featureName = getFeatureName()\n \n if (featureName.isBlank()) {\n return ValidationInfo(\"Feature \u540d\u79f0\u4e0d\u80fd\u4e3a\u7a7a\", featureNameField)\n }\n \n if (featureName.length < 2) {\n return ValidationInfo(\"Feature \u540d\u79f0\u81f3\u5c11\u9700\u89812\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26\", featureNameField)\n }\n \n if (featureName.length > 50) {\n return ValidationInfo(\"Feature \u540d\u79f0\u4e0d\u80fd\u8d85\u8fc750\u4e2a\u5b57\u7b26\", featureNameField)\n }\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u5305\u542b\u975e\u6cd5\u5b57\u7b26\n if (!featureName.matches(Regex(\"^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\\\-\\\\s]+$\"))) {\n return ValidationInfo(\"Feature \u540d\u79f0\u53ea\u80fd\u5305\u542b\u5b57\u6bcd\u3001\u6570\u5b57\u3001\u4e0b\u5212\u7ebf\u3001\u8fde\u5b57\u7b26\u548c\u7a7a\u683c\", featureNameField)\n }\n \n // \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u5426\u4ee5\u5b57\u6bcd\u5f00\u5934\n if (!featureName.first().isLetter()) {\n return ValidationInfo(\"Feature \u540d\u79f0\u5fc5\u987b\u4ee5\u5b57\u6bcd\u5f00\u5934\", featureNameField)\n }\n \n return null\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":2,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/kotlin/com/baoxin/cleanarchhelper/ui/StructureConfigDialog.kt", "file_content": "package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.ui\n\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.config.DefaultStructures\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.model.DirectoryStructure\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services.StructureConfigService\nimport com.intellij.openapi.project.Project\nimport com.intellij.openapi.ui.DialogWrapper\nimport com.intellij.openapi.ui.Messages\nimport com.intellij.ui.components.JBLabel\nimport com.intellij.ui.components.JBScrollPane\nimport com.intellij.ui.components.JBTextArea\nimport com.intellij.util.ui.FormBuilder\nimport java.awt.BorderLayout\nimport java.awt.Dimension\nimport javax.swing.*\n\n/**\n * \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u5bf9\u8bdd\u6846\n */\nclass StructureConfigDialog(private val project: Project) : DialogWrapper(project) {\n \n private val configService = StructureConfigService.getInstance()\n private val baseStructureTextArea = JBTextArea()\n private val featureStructureTextArea = JBTextArea()\n private val tabbedPane = JTabbedPane()\n \n init {\n title = \"\u914d\u7f6e Clean Architecture \u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\"\n init()\n \n // \u52a0\u8f7d\u5f53\u524d\u914d\u7f6e\n loadCurrentConfiguration()\n }\n \n override fun createCenterPanel(): JComponent {\n val panel = JPanel(BorderLayout())\n \n // \u521b\u5efa\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u9762\u677f\n val baseStructurePanel = createStructurePanel(\n baseStructureTextArea,\n \"\u914d\u7f6e\u57fa\u7840\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\uff08JSON \u683c\u5f0f\uff09\uff1a\",\n \"\u8fd9\u91cc\u5b9a\u4e49\u4e86\u521b\u5efa\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u65f6\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u5e03\u5c40\"\n )\n \n // \u521b\u5efa Feature \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u9762\u677f\n val featureStructurePanel = createStructurePanel(\n featureStructureTextArea,\n \"\u914d\u7f6e Feature \u6a21\u5757\u7ed3\u6784\uff08JSON \u683c\u5f0f\uff09\uff1a\",\n \"\u8fd9\u91cc\u5b9a\u4e49\u4e86\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\u65f6\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u5e03\u5c40\"\n )\n \n // \u6dfb\u52a0\u5230\u9009\u9879\u5361\u9762\u677f\n tabbedPane.addTab(\"\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\", baseStructurePanel)\n tabbedPane.addTab(\"Feature \u7ed3\u6784\", featureStructurePanel)\n \n panel.add(tabbedPane, BorderLayout.CENTER)\n \n // \u6dfb\u52a0\u6309\u94ae\u9762\u677f\n val buttonPanel = createButtonPanel()\n panel.add(buttonPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH)\n \n panel.preferredSize = Dimension(800, 600)\n \n return panel\n }\n \n private fun createStructurePanel(textArea: JBTextArea, labelText: String, tooltipText: String): JComponent {\n textArea.rows = 20\n textArea.columns = 60\n textArea.lineWrap = true\n textArea.wrapStyleWord = true\n textArea.toolTipText = tooltipText\n \n val scrollPane = JBScrollPane(textArea)\n scrollPane.verticalScrollBarPolicy = JScrollPane.VERTICAL_SCROLLBAR_AS_NEEDED\n scrollPane.horizontalScrollBarPolicy = JScrollPane.HORIZONTAL_SCROLLBAR_AS_NEEDED\n \n return FormBuilder.createFormBuilder()\n .addLabeledComponent(JBLabel(labelText), scrollPane, true)\n .panel\n }\n \n private fun createButtonPanel(): JComponent {\n val panel = JPanel()\n \n val resetBaseButton = JButton(\"\u91cd\u7f6e\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\")\n resetBaseButton.addActionListener {\n val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(\n project,\n \"\u786e\u5b9a\u8981\u91cd\u7f6e\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u4e3a\u9ed8\u8ba4\u503c\u5417\uff1f\",\n \"\u786e\u8ba4\u91cd\u7f6e\",\n Messages.getQuestionIcon()\n )\n if (result == Messages.YES) {\n val defaultStructure = DefaultStructures.getDefaultBaseStructure()\n baseStructureTextArea.text = formatJson(defaultStructure.toJson())\n }\n }\n \n val resetFeatureButton = JButton(\"\u91cd\u7f6e Feature \u7ed3\u6784\")\n resetFeatureButton.addActionListener {\n val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(\n project,\n \"\u786e\u5b9a\u8981\u91cd\u7f6e Feature \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u4e3a\u9ed8\u8ba4\u503c\u5417\uff1f\",\n \"\u786e\u8ba4\u91cd\u7f6e\",\n Messages.getQuestionIcon()\n )\n if (result == Messages.YES) {\n val defaultStructure = DefaultStructures.getDefaultFeatureStructure()\n featureStructureTextArea.text = formatJson(defaultStructure.toJson())\n }\n }\n \n val previewButton = JButton(\"\u9884\u89c8\u7ed3\u6784\")\n previewButton.addActionListener {\n previewCurrentStructure()\n }\n \n panel.add(resetBaseButton)\n panel.add(resetFeatureButton)\n panel.add(previewButton)\n \n return panel\n }\n \n private fun loadCurrentConfiguration() {\n val baseStructure = configService.getBaseStructure()\n val featureStructure = configService.getFeatureStructure()\n \n baseStructureTextArea.text = formatJson(baseStructure.toJson())\n featureStructureTextArea.text = formatJson(featureStructure.toJson())\n }\n \n private fun previewCurrentStructure() {\n try {\n val currentTab = tabbedPane.selectedIndex\n val structure = if (currentTab == 0) {\n DirectoryStructure.fromJson(baseStructureTextArea.text)\n } else {\n DirectoryStructure.fromJson(featureStructureTextArea.text)\n }\n \n val preview = structure.getAllPaths().joinToString(\"\\n\")\n val structureType = if (currentTab == 0) \"\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\" else \"Feature \u7ed3\u6784\"\n \n Messages.showInfoMessage(\n project,\n \"\u5f53\u524d $structureType \u9884\u89c8\uff1a\\n\\n$preview\",\n \"\u7ed3\u6784\u9884\u89c8\"\n )\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Messages.showErrorDialog(\n project,\n \"\u89e3\u6790\u914d\u7f6e\u65f6\u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef\uff1a\\n${e.message}\",\n \"\u914d\u7f6e\u9519\u8bef\"\n )\n }\n }\n \n override fun doOKAction() {\n try {\n // \u9a8c\u8bc1\u5e76\u4fdd\u5b58\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\n val baseStructure = DirectoryStructure.fromJson(baseStructureTextArea.text)\n configService.setBaseStructure(baseStructure)\n \n // \u9a8c\u8bc1\u5e76\u4fdd\u5b58 Feature \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\n val featureStructure = DirectoryStructure.fromJson(featureStructureTextArea.text)\n configService.setFeatureStructure(featureStructure)\n \n Messages.showInfoMessage(\n project,\n \"\u914d\u7f6e\u5df2\u4fdd\u5b58\u6210\u529f\uff01\",\n \"\u4fdd\u5b58\u6210\u529f\"\n )\n \n super.doOKAction()\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Messages.showErrorDialog(\n project,\n \"\u4fdd\u5b58\u914d\u7f6e\u65f6\u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef\uff1a\\n${e.message}\\n\\n\u8bf7\u68c0\u67e5 JSON \u683c\u5f0f\u662f\u5426\u6b63\u786e\u3002\",\n \"\u4fdd\u5b58\u5931\u8d25\"\n )\n }\n }\n \n private fun formatJson(json: String): String {\n // \u7b80\u5355\u7684 JSON \u683c\u5f0f\u5316\n return json.replace(\",\", \",\\n\")\n .replace(\"{\", \"{\\n\")\n .replace(\"}\", \"\\n}\")\n .replace(\"\\\":\", \"\\\": \")\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":0,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":2,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/kotlin/com/baoxin/cleanarchhelper/settings/CleanArchConfigurable.kt", "file_content": "package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.settings\n\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.config.DefaultStructures\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.model.DirectoryStructure\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.services.StructureConfigService\nimport com.intellij.openapi.options.Configurable\nimport com.intellij.openapi.ui.Messages\nimport com.intellij.ui.components.JBLabel\nimport com.intellij.ui.components.JBScrollPane\nimport com.intellij.ui.components.JBTextArea\nimport com.intellij.util.ui.FormBuilder\nimport java.awt.BorderLayout\nimport java.awt.Dimension\nimport javax.swing.*\n\n/**\n * Clean Architecture Helper \u8bbe\u7f6e\u9875\u9762\n */\nclass CleanArchConfigurable : Configurable {\n \n private val configService = StructureConfigService.getInstance()\n private var settingsPanel: JPanel? = null\n private var baseStructureTextArea: JBTextArea? = null\n private var featureStructureTextArea: JBTextArea? = null\n \n override fun getDisplayName(): String = \"Clean Architecture Helper\"\n \n override fun createComponent(): JComponent? {\n if (settingsPanel == null) {\n settingsPanel = createSettingsPanel()\n }\n return settingsPanel\n }\n \n private fun createSettingsPanel(): JPanel {\n val panel = JPanel(BorderLayout())\n \n // \u521b\u5efa\u9009\u9879\u5361\u9762\u677f\n val tabbedPane = JTabbedPane()\n \n // \u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u9009\u9879\u5361\n baseStructureTextArea = JBTextArea()\n baseStructureTextArea!!.rows = 15\n baseStructureTextArea!!.columns = 50\n baseStructureTextArea!!.lineWrap = true\n baseStructureTextArea!!.wrapStyleWord = true\n \n val baseScrollPane = JBScrollPane(baseStructureTextArea!!)\n val basePanel = FormBuilder.createFormBuilder()\n .addLabeledComponent(\n JBLabel(\"\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e (JSON \u683c\u5f0f):\"),\n baseScrollPane,\n true\n )\n .addComponent(createBaseStructureButtonPanel())\n .panel\n \n tabbedPane.addTab(\"\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\", basePanel)\n \n // Feature \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u9009\u9879\u5361\n featureStructureTextArea = JBTextArea()\n featureStructureTextArea!!.rows = 15\n featureStructureTextArea!!.columns = 50\n featureStructureTextArea!!.lineWrap = true\n featureStructureTextArea!!.wrapStyleWord = true\n \n val featureScrollPane = JBScrollPane(featureStructureTextArea!!)\n val featurePanel = FormBuilder.createFormBuilder()\n .addLabeledComponent(\n JBLabel(\"Feature \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e (JSON \u683c\u5f0f):\"),\n featureScrollPane,\n true\n )\n .addComponent(createFeatureStructureButtonPanel())\n .panel\n \n tabbedPane.addTab(\"Feature \u7ed3\u6784\", featurePanel)\n \n // \u5e2e\u52a9\u9009\u9879\u5361\n val helpPanel = createHelpPanel()\n tabbedPane.addTab(\"\u5e2e\u52a9\", helpPanel)\n \n panel.add(tabbedPane, BorderLayout.CENTER)\n panel.preferredSize = Dimension(800, 600)\n \n return panel\n }\n \n private fun createBaseStructureButtonPanel(): JComponent {\n val panel = JPanel()\n \n val resetButton = JButton(\"\u91cd\u7f6e\u4e3a\u9ed8\u8ba4\")\n resetButton.addActionListener {\n val result = Messages.showYesNoDialog(\n \"\u786e\u5b9a\u8981\u91cd\u7f6e\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\u4e3a\u9ed8\u8ba4\u503c\u5417\uff1f\",\n \"\u786e\u8ba4\u91cd\u7f6e\",\n Messages.getQuestionIcon()\n )\n if (result == Messages.YES) {\n val defaultStructure = DefaultStructures.getDefaultBaseStructure()\n baseStructureTextArea?.text = formatJson(defaultStructure.toJson())\n }\n }\n \n val previewButton = JButton(\"\u9884\u89c8\u7ed3\u6784\")\n previewButton.addActionListener {\n try {\n val structure = DirectoryStructure.fromJson(baseStructureTextArea?.text ?: \"\")\n val preview = structure.getAllPaths().joinToString(\"\\n\")\n Messages.showInfoMessage(\n \"\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u9884\u89c8\uff1a\\n\\n$preview\",\n \"\u7ed3\u6784\u9884\u89c8\"\n )\n } catch (e: Exception) {\n Messages.showErrorDialog(\n \"\u89e3\u6790\u914d\u7f6e\u65f6\u53d1\u751f\u9519\u8bef\uff1a\\n${e.message}\",\n \"\u914d\u7f6e\u9519\u8bef\"\n )\n }\n }\n \n panel.add(resetButton)\n panel.add(previewButton)\n \n return panel\n }\n \n private fun createFeatureStructureButtonPanel(): JComponent {\n val panel = JPanel()\n \n val resetButton = Helper\n\n\u4e00\u4e2a\u7528\u4e8e\u5feb\u901f\u521b\u5efa Clean Architecture \u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\u7684 JetBrains \u63d2\u4ef6\uff0c\u652f\u6301 Flutter\u3001React\u3001Node.js \u7b49\u9879\u76ee\u3002\n\n## \u529f\u80fd\u7279\u6027\n\n### \ud83c\udfd7\ufe0f \u521b\u5efa\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\n- \u5feb\u901f\u521b\u5efa\u5b8c\u6574\u7684 Clean Architecture \u57fa\u7840\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n- \u5305\u542b `core`\u3001`features`\u3001`shared` \u7b49\u6807\u51c6\u76ee\u5f55\n- \u652f\u6301\u591a\u79cd\u9879\u76ee\u7c7b\u578b\uff08Flutter\u3001React\u3001Node.js \u7b49\uff09\n\n### \ud83c\udfaf \u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\n- \u4e3a\u6bcf\u4e2a\u529f\u80fd\u6a21\u5757\u5feb\u901f\u521b\u5efa\u6807\u51c6\u7684\u4e09\u5c42\u67b6\u6784\u76ee\u5f55\n- \u5305\u542b `data`\u3001`domain`\u3001`presentation` \u5c42\n- \u81ea\u52a8\u89c4\u8303\u5316 Feature \u540d\u79f0\n\n### \u2699\ufe0f \u53ef\u914d\u7f6e\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n- \u5b8c\u5168\u53ef\u81ea\u5b9a\u4e49\u7684\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\n- \u652f\u6301\u591a\u5c42\u7ea7\u5d4c\u5957\u76ee\u5f55\n- \u53ef\u4ee5\u4fdd\u5b58\u548c\u91cd\u7f6e\u914d\u7f6e\n\n## \u4f7f\u7528\u65b9\u6cd5\n\n### 1. \u521b\u5efa\u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\n- \u5728\u6587\u4ef6\u8d44\u6e90\u7ba1\u7406\u5668\u4e2d\u53f3\u952e\u70b9\u51fb\u76ee\u5f55\n- \u9009\u62e9 \"\u521b\u5efa Clean Architecture \u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\"\n- \u6216\u4f7f\u7528\u5feb\u6377\u952e\uff1a`Ctrl+Alt+B`\n\n### 2. \u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\n- \u5728\u6587\u4ef6\u8d44\u6e90\u7ba1\u7406\u5668\u4e2d\u53f3\u952e\u70b9\u51fb\u76ee\u5f55\uff08\u63a8\u8350\u5728 `features` \u76ee\u5f55\u4e2d\uff09\n- \u9009\u62e9 \"\u521b\u5efa Feature \u6a21\u5757\"\n- \u8f93\u5165 Feature \u540d\u79f0\n- \u6216\u4f7f\u7528\u5feb\u6377\u952e\uff1a`Ctrl+Alt+F`\n\n### 3. \u914d\u7f6e\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n- \u4f7f\u7528\u8bbe\u7f6e\u9762\u677f\uff1a`File > Settings > Tools > Clean Architecture Helper`\n- \u9009\u62e9\u8981\u7f16\u8f91\u7684\u914d\u7f6e\u7c7b\u578b\n- \u652f\u6301\u67e5\u770b\u3001\u7f16\u8f91\u3001\u91cd\u7f6e\u914d\u7f6e\n\n## \u9ed8\u8ba4\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\n\n### \u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\n```\nlib/\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 core/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 constants/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 errors/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 network/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 usecases/\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 utils/\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 features/\n\u2514\u2500\u2500 shared/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 data/\n \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 datasources/\n \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 models/\n \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 repositories/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 domain/\n \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 entities/\n \u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 repositories/\n \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 usecases/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 presentation/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 controllers/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 pages/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 widgets/\n```\n\n### Feature \u7ed3\u6784\n```\nfeature_name/\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 data/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 datasources/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 models/\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 repositories/\n\u251c\u2500\u2500 domain/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 entities/\n\u2502 \u251c\u2500\u2500 repositories/\n\u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500 usecases/\n\u2514\u2500\u2500 presentation/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 bindings/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 controllers/\n \u251c\u2500\u2500 pages/\n \u2514\u2500\u2500 widgets/\n```\n\n## \u5f00\u53d1\n\n### \u6784\u5efa\u63d2\u4ef6\n```bash\n./gradlew buildPlugin\n```\n\n### \u8fd0\u884c\u63d2\u4ef6\n```bash\n./gradlew runIde\n```\n\n### \u6d4b\u8bd5\n```bash\n./gradlew test\n```\n\n## \u914d\u7f6e\u8bf4\u660e\n\n\u63d2\u4ef6\u652f\u6301\u901a\u8fc7\u8bbe\u7f6e\u9875\u9762\u8fdb\u884c\u914d\u7f6e\uff1a\n\n### \u57fa\u7840\u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\n\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\u4f7f\u7528\u5d4c\u5957\u7684 JSON \u5bf9\u8c61\u8868\u793a\uff0c\u6bcf\u4e2a\u952e\u4ee3\u8868\u4e00\u4e2a\u76ee\u5f55\u540d\uff0c\u503c\u4e3a\u8be5\u76ee\u5f55\u7684\u5b50\u76ee\u5f55\u7ed3\u6784\u3002\n\n### Feature \u7ed3\u6784\u914d\u7f6e\n\u540c\u6837\u4f7f\u7528 JSON \u683c\u5f0f\u5b9a\u4e49 Feature \u6a21\u5757\u7684\u5185\u90e8\u7ed3\u6784\u3002\n\n## \u652f\u6301\u7684\u9879\u76ee\u7c7b\u578b\n\n- **Flutter**: \u4f7f\u7528 `lib/` \u4f5c\u4e3a\u6839\u76ee\u5f55\uff0c\u5305\u542b `theme/` \u7b49 Flutter \u7279\u5b9a\u76ee\u5f55\n- **React**: \u4f7f\u7528 `src/` "file_content": "package com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper\n\nimport com.baoxin.cleanarchhelper.model.DirectoryStructure\nimport org.junit.Test\nimport kotlin.test.assertEquals\nimport kotlin.test.assertFalse\nimport kotlin.test.assertTrue\n\nclass DirectoryStructureTest {\n \n @Test\n fun testEmptyStructureIsLeaf() {\n val structure = DirectoryStructure()\n assertTrue(structure.isLeaf())\n }\n \n @Test\n fun testStructureWithDirectoriesIsNotLeaf() {\n val structure = DirectoryStructure(\n mapOf(\"data\" to DirectoryStructure())\n )\n assertFalse(structure.isLeaf())\n }\n \n @Test\n fun testGetAllPaths() {\n val structure = DirectoryStructure(\n mapOf(\n \"data\" to DirectoryStructure(\n mapOf(\n \"models\" to DirectoryStructure(),\n \"repositories\" to DirectoryStructure()\n )\n ),\n \"domain\" to DirectoryStructure(\n mapOf(\n \"entities\" to DirectoryStructure()\n )\n )\n )\n )\n \n val paths = structure.getAllPaths()\n val expectedPaths = listOf(\n \"data\",\n \"data/models\",\n \"data/repositories\",\n \"domain\",\n \"domain/entities\"\n )\n \n assertEquals(expectedPaths.sorted(), paths.sorted())\n }\n \n @Test\n fun testFromMapAndToMap() {\n val originalMap = mapOf(\n \"data\" to mapOf(\n \"models\" to emptyMap<String, Any>(),\n \"repositories\" to emptyMap<String, Any>()\n ),\n \"domain\" to mapOf(\n \"entities\" to emptyMap<String, Any>()\n )\n )\n \n val structure = DirectoryStructure.fromMap(originalMap)\n val resultMap = DirectoryStructure.toMap(structure)\n \n assertEquals(originalMap, resultMap)\n }\n \n @Test\n fun testJsonSerialization() {\n val structure = DirectoryStructure(\n mapOf(\n \"data\" to DirectoryStructure(\n mapOf(\"models\" to DirectoryStructure())\n )\n )\n )\n \n val json = structure.toJson()\n val deserializedStructure = DirectoryStructure.fromJson(json)\n \n assertEquals(structure.getAllPaths(), 我已经成功为您创建了一个完整的 Clean Architecture Helper JetBrains 插件。以下是已实现的功能：

### ✅ 已完成的功能

#### 1. 核心架构
- **DirectoryStructure.kt** - 目录结构数据模型，支持 JSON 序列化
- **DefaultStructures.kt** - 默认配置，支持 Flutter、React、Node.js 项目
- **StructureConfigService.kt** - 配置管理服务，支持持久化
- **DirectoryCreatorService.kt** - 目录创建服务

#### 2. 用户界面
- **CreateBaseStructureAction.kt** - 创建基础结构的右键菜单操作
- **CreateFeatureAction.kt** - 创建 Feature 模块的右键菜单操作 
- **ConfigureStructureAction.kt** - 配置目录结构的操作
- **FeatureNameDialog.kt** - Feature 名称输入对话框
- **StructureConfigDialog.kt** - 结构配置对话框
- **CleanArchConfigurable.kt** - 设置页面

#### 3. 插件配置
- **plugin.xml** - 完整的插件配置，包含所有 Actions 和扩展点
- **build.gradle.kts** - 构建配置，包含必要的依赖

### 功能特性

1. **️ 创建基础结构**
 - 支持右键菜单操作
 - 快捷键：`Ctrl+Alt+B`
 - 支持多种项目类型的默认结构

2. ** 创建 Feature 模块**
 - 支持右键菜单操作
 - 快捷键：`Ctrl+Alt+F`
 - 自动规范化 Feature 名称
 - 输入验证

3. **⚙️ 可配置的目录结构**
 - 设置页面：`File > Settings > Tools > Clean Architecture Helper`
 - JSON 格式配置
 - 支持预览和重置
 - 持久化配置

### 默认目录结构

#### 基础结构
```
lib/
├── core/
│ ├── constants/
│ ├── errors/
│ ├── network/
│ ├── usecases/
│ └── utils/
├── features/
└── shared/
 ├── data/
 ├── domain/
 └── presentation/
```

#### Feature 结构
```
feature_name/
├── data/
│ ├── datasources/
│ ├── models/
│ └── repositories/
├── domain/
│ ├── entities/
│ ├── repositories/
│ └── usecases/
└── presentation/
 ├── bindings/
 ├── controllers/
 ├── pages/
 └── widgets/
```

### 如何使用

1. **构建插件**：
 ```bash
 ./gradlew buildPlugin
 ```

2. **运行开发环境**：
 ```bash
 ./gradlew runIde
 ```

3. **安装插件**：
 - 构建完成后，插件文件位于 `build/distributions/`
 - 在 JetBrains IDE 中通过 `File > Settings > Plugins > Install Plugin from Disk` 安装

### 使用方法

1. **创建基础结构**：在项目视图中右键点击目录 → "创建 Clean Architecture 基础结构"
2. **创建 Feature**：在项目视图中右键点击目录 → "创建 Feature 模块" → 输入名称
3. **配置结构**：`File > Settings > Tools > Clean Architecture Helper`

插件已经完全实现了您需求文档中的所有功能，包括可配置的目录结构、多项目类型支持、用户友好的界面等。代码结构清晰，遵循了 Clean Architecture 原则，易于维护和扩展。
